item.title: Learn Enough Command Line to Be Dangerous
item.description:
Ebook

Just finished reading Learn Enough Command Line to Be Dangerous.

This gives some basic introduction to the unix cli usages. Some of the most frequently used (and might also be the most helpful ones) are:

  • man
  • ls
  • echo (use “>” to write into files, use “>>” to append content)
  • cat
  • mv
  • cp
  • grep (pipe operator “|”)
  • less (vs. more)
  • head and tail
  • …
